title: 15.5: Epistolary Romances
dc:creator: Jennifer Prokop
description: Love letters are the best because they’re personal and honest and raw and beautiful, and this week—by request—we’re talking about all the different ways romance tells epistolary love stories! Leave us your own version of a love note in comments!
itunes:author: Fated Mates
itunes:subtitle: Jen and Sarah discuss love letters
